definition: to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student

sentences.english: Probiotics contain live micro-organisms, so-called good bacteria that colonize the intestine.
sentences.chinese: 益生菌含有活力微生物，可以在腸道內存活繁殖。

sentences.english: The Olympic Spirit is the spirit of mutual understanding friendship solidarity and fair play.
sentences.chinese: 理解友愛合生芫益生菌價格團結和公平。

sentences.english: Also, probiotics and magnesium vitamins often help keep your body on a healthy, digestive roll.
sentences.chinese: 益生菌和鎂維生素使你的消化系統順暢健康地運作。

sentences.english: The company tested probiotic supplements last year.
sentences.chinese: 該公司去年對益生菌補充劑進行了檢測。

sentences.english: Culturelle maintains potency best when refrigerated.
sentences.chinese: 冷藏可以堅持益生菌的最好效能。

sentences.english: The application of milk oligopeptides in probiotics yogurt was studied in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 研究了牛乳低聚肽在益生菌酸奶中的應用。

sentences.english: Some daily products now widely advertise that they contain probiotics, or good bacteria.
sentences.chinese: 現在很多日常產品都宣稱含有益生菌或好的細菌。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss the experience in treatment of Onychomycosis by supplementing intestinal probiotics.
sentences.chinese: 目的總結補充腸道益生菌治癒甲真菌病的經驗。

sentences.english: Probiotic yoghurts have only a small effect on gut bacteria.
sentences.chinese: 益生菌酸奶對腸道菌羣的影響微乎其微。

sentences.english: Foods like yogurt and fermented foods naturally contain bacteria called probiotics.
sentences.chinese: 像酸奶和發酵食品之類，自然含有所謂的益生菌。

sentences.english: In a routine check on probiotics, she also found something unusual.
sentences.chinese: 對益生菌進行的例行檢查，她也發現一些異常。

sentences.english: Effect of Se probiotics on lipid metabolism in hens were studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了富硒益生菌對蛋雞脂代謝的影響。

sentences.english: Culturelle must not exceed 75 degrees Fahrenheit.
sentences.chinese: 益生菌存放溫度不克不及跨越75華氏攝氏度。

sentences.english: The review also found that probiotics can help prevent diarrhea in children who are taking antibiotics.
sentences.chinese: 文章還稱益生菌可預防兒童因使用抗生素髮生腹瀉。

sentences.english: Result Onychomycosis was cured by supplementing intestinal probiotics.
sentences.chinese: 結果補充腸道益生菌可以治癒甲真菌病。

sentences.english: Yogurt must contain active and living cultures to be yogurt.
sentences.chinese: 酸奶必須要含有有活性的益生菌羣才能被稱之爲酸奶。

definition: peptide (two or more amino acids linked by peptide bonds CO-NH)
Bacillus subtilis (formerly Bacillus natto), a common soil bacterium
